script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_agreement_close_date; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_agreement_close_date AS SELECT DISTINCT f.amp_activity_id, ag.close_date as close_date, ag.id, (ag.title::text || ' - '::text) || ag.code::text AS "Agreement Title + Code", ag.code AS "Agreement Code", o.name AS "Donor Agency", o.amp_org_id, ag.title AS agreement_title, f.type_of_assistance_category_va as terms_assist_id, f.financing_instr_category_value as financing_instrument_id, f.amp_donor_org_id as donor_org_id, f.mode_of_payment_category_va as mode_of_payment_id, f.funding_status_category_va as funding_status_id, f.agreement as agreement_id, f.amp_funding_id as funding_id FROM amp_agreement ag, amp_funding f, amp_organisation o WHERE f.agreement=ag.id AND f.amp_donor_org_id = o.amp_org_id AND ag.close_date IS NOT NULL;
